oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Processing of Wheat to Bread Control of Quality and Safety in Organic Production Chains
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brandt, Kirsten
L端ck, Lorna
Bergamo, Paolo
Whitley, Andrew
Velimirov, Alberta
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This leaflet provides a practical overview for millers, bakers and others involved in production of flour and bread, on what can be done at these steps to improve the quality and safety of organically produced bread, in addition to certification and general food safety requirements. A separate leaflet covers the wheat production and grain storage steps, and other leaflets cover other commodities or aim at consumers and retailers.
